price: They will say, “Why do we not see those whom we considered to be among the wicked[22]?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ
footnotes: [22] They are alluding to the believers.
